attributes.action: Give key workers their income tax back for working through the lockdown
attributes.additional_details: To take a vote on whether a tax refund can be returned to the people who have worked through the lockdowns.
attributes.background: These are the people who have kept the country going while the rest have sat on their couches laughing at those who are still working 40 hours plus, and without any financial gain.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/567150
